jobs.title: Senior Staff Backend Engineer
skills_suggest: 10+ years building and operating backend systems in production at scale
Expertise in Rust, Go, or TypeScript for systems-level engineering
Deep knowledge of distributed systems (consensus, replication, failure modes, consistency)
Experience designing low-latency, high-throughput architectures
Strong observability, performance tuning, and incident response skills
Proven ability to lead cross-cutting, ambiguous technical problems
Familiarity with blockchain/crypto systems is a strong plus
